contents.item: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
No man can be a failure if he thinks he's a success; If he thinks he is a winner, then he is.
Even if you are on the right track, but just sit there, you will still get run over.
If you have a success you have it for the wrong reasons. If you become popular it is always because of the worst aspects of your work.
It is wise to keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final.
Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavour.
The key ingredient to any kind of happiness or success is to never give less than your best
Those who reach for the Sun, usually drop the world.
Why be a man when you can be a success.
My dreams are worthless, my plans are dust, my goals are impossible.All are of no value unless they are followed by action.
contents.owner: Og Mandino, The Greatest Salesman in the World

contents.item: Sometimes, you have to step into oblivion, in order to paint success.
To be successful, you must decide exactly what you want to accomplish, then resolve to pay the price to get it.
One person's success doesn't take away from your own.
The awful penalty of success is the haunting dread of subsequent failure.
contents.owner: A.C. Benson, Escape and Other Essays
